title: Schema of voice elements
description: A voice element is a symbol that can appear as part of a voice in a measure. Either a note, a rest or a clef

no_group.description: Group = beam. Each beam has a unique id

slur.description: A string that starts either with 'i' (inital) or 't' (terminal), followed by the slur id (i.e., i1, i2, t2, t1)

num.description: Used for tuplet: gives the actual number of events wrt the expected one (specified by numbase)

numbase.description: Used for tuplet: gives the expected number of events wrt the actual one (specified by num)
